scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=host" "npm run preview --workspace=auth" "npm run preview --workspace=customers"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=host && npm run build --workspace=auth && npm run build --workspace=customers
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=host && npm run clean --workspace=auth && npm run clean --workspace=customers
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=host && npm run lint --workspace=auth && npm run lint --workspace=customers
scripts.deploy:host: npm run build:host && echo 'Deploy host para produção'
scripts.deploy:auth: npm run build:auth && echo 'Deploy auth para produção'
scripts.deploy:customers: npm run build:customers && echo 'Deploy customers para produção'
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && echo 'Deploy todos os microfrontends para produção'
